description: The significant earthquakes catalog includes information on about 5,000 earthquakes that meet one or more of these criteria: $1 million (1990 dollars) or more damage, at least 10 deaths, magnitude 7.5 or greater, or modified mercalli intensity ''X'' or greater.
keywords: Solid Earth | Seismology | Earthquake Occurrences, Mauritius
name: Mauritius AOI: Significant Earthquakes till 2008
